hackathon-description-text: Join up with game developers of all experience levels and prototype a game!
hackathon-eligibility:
Come to Microsoft's office in San Francisco at 6pm on Friday September 12th to participate.
The event will take place between 6pm to Midnight on the 12th, 10am to Midnight on the 13th, and 10am to 4pm on the 14th.
At 2pm on Sunday, September 12th all work will stop, and we will begin showing off our work to other as well as sponsor prize juding/awards/wrap up ceremony.
hackathon-requirements: Any type of game is welcome! Web, mobile, tablet, desktop, even board/card/pen and paper games if you're so inclinded.
hackathon-rules:
Prizes will be awared by sponsors, based on their own judging criteria and methods.
Everyone is welcome, however the Indepdent Game Developers of Silicon Valley reserve the right to ask anyone to leave for any reaon. For example, any hate speech, or creating a hostile enviroment for other game jammers will not be tolerated.
Game jammers will be sent from between midnigth and 10am each night, no overnight stays allowed. Get some sleep! It's good for your health!

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: The prizes will be announced on Friday during the sponsor pitch session.

hackathon-location-google-maps: https://maps.google.com/?q=835 Market St, San Francisco, CA 94103, USA

hackathon-judging-criteria.judging-criterion:
Each prize will have varying criteria based on the sponsor.

The better use of the products, platforms and tools of the sponsor, the better chance you have of willing their prize!

hackathon-location-address: 835 Market St, San Francisco, CA 94103, USA
hackathon-description-header: Create a new prototype game that could be the next big thing!
